Translates messages into selected languages using the OpenAI API for fast, accurate translations.

Instant language translations for smooth conversations in multiple languages.
This extension integrates the powerful OpenAI API Chat GPT into your browser to translate messages in real time. Whether you're chatting with friends, colleagues, business partners, or in group chats, AI Chat-Translator ensures that language barriers are a thing of the past. The extension provides simple and accurate translations in a variety of languages and adapts flexibly to your conversation style.

Features:
Automatically translates messages into your chosen target language.
Supports over 50 languages, including English, Spanish, German, Chinese, and many more.
Choose your preferred conversation tone: Standard, Formal, Business, or Casual.
Translates messages without changing their original tone or meaning.
Seamless integration into existing chat applications within the browser.
User-friendly interface with options to select source and target languages.
Saves your language settings for future chats.
With this extension, you can:
Receive instant translations while chatting without interrupting the conversation.
Choose customizable conversation modes suited for different occasions and communication styles.
Automatically save your messages and easily access the chat history.
Perfect for users who frequently communicate with people from different countries and cultures. Whether you're chatting for business or personal reasons, AI Chat-Translator makes real-time translations effortless.

Whether you're chatting on Twitch, WhatsApp Web, or in live support chats like Zendesk or Intercom, this extension ensures smooth and accurate GPT-powered translations. With customizable conversation modes—Standard, Formal, Business, or Casual—you can adjust the tone while keeping the original meaning of your messages intact. It's perfect for gamers on Discord or Steam, as well as professionals using platforms like Slack or Microsoft Teams for international communication.

The extension is easy to install and ready to use right away. Simply select your source and target languages, adjust your conversation tone, and let the AI handle the rest!

How to use:
Click the ⚙️ icon to adjust your conversation settings and select your desired tone.
To send a message, choose the source and target languages, and start your conversation.
Your translations will appear automatically in the output area.
Save your preferred settings for the next conversation.
